data.name: Midnight Stories 3
data.detailed_description:
Midnight Stories

This game continues the life of Cindy, that takes 33% of the game and the rest is full of side stories with various people and hot scenes. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.
The game will be in 4K ultra HD resolution and fully voiced. For the side stories a huge numbers of voice actors will be delivering crystal audio for your pleasure.

The MS3 plan is to have 5 episodes and 10 side stories (at least 2 side stories per episode).
I'm releasing the game earlier, in case someone is OK with the monthly updates. This supports also the game as your money is invested.
As always the episodes are high quality: at least 100 renders, with the new "choose your camera" it will be 2x 100 and at least 2x voice actors.
Thank you for your support.

Game Plan

1 - The Exam
1.1 Locker Room Trio
1.2 University Cinema
2 - Oh Captain, My Captain
3 - Demons in Dreams - NOAH
4 - Demons in Dreams - Liam (in progress)
5 - Two side stories:
5.1 More Diamonds
5.2 The Argument (Katie and Victoria) (in progress)

data.short_description: Midnight StoriesThis game continues the life of Cindy, that takes 33% of the game and the rest is full of side stories with various people and hot scenes. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.The game will be in 4K ultra HD resolution and fully voiced.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft XP
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: any Linux version
  • Processor: 32bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes with sex and explicit genitals are visible. Genitals might appear in some renders as well. Sexual violence is included, in a very mild form or only partly in consensual sex scenes as part of the act but absolutely willingly. Drugs and alcohol are no main topic but can appear in story relevant quests and dialogues. Self-harm is not included.
